name: UTERINE_CERVIX_EXC
description: Stores single response data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76062-UTERINE CERVIX: Excision.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Size.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_OTHER_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other specimen.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: HISTOLOGIC_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade.
entries: Favorable (purely epithelial, fetal subtype, mitotically inactive with <=2 mitoses in
Less favorable (all subtypes other than those designated "Favorable" or "Unfavorable"
Unfavorable (small cell undifferentiated or rhabdoid as the predominant or sole histo

columns.name: HIST_TYP_NONCL_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other or nonclassifiable histologic type.

columns.name: HIST_TP_SQUA_CCNM_S
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify details for Histologic Type Squamous cell carcinoma.

columns.name: HIST_TP_ADCCNM_OS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other details for Histologic Type Adenocarcinoma.

columns.name: STRML_INVSN_DEPTH
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Stromal Invasion Depth.

columns.name: STRML_INVSN_HRZL_XT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Stromal Invasion Horizontal Extent.

columns.name: ENDC_MG_CNNT_ASSD_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Endocervical Margin invasive carcinoma.
entries: Not involved by intraepithelial squamous neoplasia
Not involved by adenocarcinoma in situ

columns.name: ENDC_MG_IVLV_IC_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Endocervical Margin Involved by Invasive Carcinoma.

columns.name: DSTC_INVS_CCNM_XM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Distance of Invasive Carcinoma from Margin for Not involved by invasive carcinoma when Exocervical Margin cannot be assessed.

columns.name: XCVL_MG_INV_CCNM_LC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify location for Exocervical Margin Involved by invasive carcinoma.

columns.name: XCVC_MG_IVLV_IC_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Exocervical Margin Involved by Invasive Carcinoma.

columns.name: ITAEP_SQM_NPS_GRD
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify grade for Exocervical Margin Involved by intraepithelial squamous neoplasia.

columns.name: DSTNC_INV_CCNM_EM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify distance of invasive carcinoma from Endocervical Margin when invasive carcinoma not involved.

columns.name: EM_NINVSV_CCNM_LOC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify location for Endocervical Margin not Involved by invasive carcinoma.

columns.name: EM_INVSV_CCNM_LOC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify location for Endocervical Margin Involved by invasive carcinoma.

columns.name: EM_IVLV_ISN_GRD
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify grade for Endocervical Margin Involved by intraepithelial squamous neoplasia.

columns.name: DSTNC_INV_CCNM_DMNA
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Distance of Invasive Carcinoma from Margin for Deep Margin when Margins cannot be assessed and Not involved by invasive carcinoma.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify location for Deep Margin when Uninvolved.

columns.name: DM_NA_IIC_LOC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify location for Deep Margin when Involved.

columns.name: DM_NA_IISN_GRD
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify grade for Deep Margin when Margins cannot be assessed and involved by intraepithelial squamous neoplasia.

columns.name: XCRVCL_MG_IIC_LOC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify location for Exocervical Margin Not involved by invasive carcinoma.

entries: Not involved by intraepithelial squamous neoplasia

entries: Not involved by adenocarcinoma in situ
